name: Jobs4You
desc: Designed and developed a job portal to bridge job seekers and recruiters via an intuitive UI.

name: Blood Management System
desc: Developed a full-stack system to manage blood stock, donation records, donor scheduling, and patient requests.

name: Coffee Shop E-commerce UI/UX
desc: Created a high-fidelity prototype for a modern coffee shop e-commerce platform. Focused on clean aesthetics, responsive layout, and seamless user flow from product to checkout.
